name: SnapModo
short_description:
Here's an example of the process: Take a photo with your phone/camera and upload it via the website or IOS/Android application and then it will bring you to a menu that lets you type an 100 word (optional) tag and then select an emoticon based on the feelings you felt during the picture or the feelings you want the picture to display. 
The team consists of Alexander Wilton-Reeves and Will Thomas. 
We are both students so we would be looking to expand the team if this took off or got some funding.
summary: SnapModo is a photo-sharing service that lets you upload/take pictures
